patthana23.13:1.1_0: Nakusalaṁ nahīnaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā akusalo hīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.13:2.1_0: Nakusalaṁ namajjhimaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato majjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.13:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.13:3.1_0: Nakusalaṁ napaṇītaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo paṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.13:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
